casebody.data:
STATE
v.
FERRER & INSURANCE. No. 313P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Kenneth P. Anderson, for Aegis Security Ins. Co. Alan V. Pugh, Asheboro, for Randolph Co. Bd. of Education.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by Randolph County Board of Education to Deny Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
